name: superreactive
description: A package that allows instances to be marked "reactive" and get seamlessly synchronized throughout two distinct processes over the network using Redis and BullMQ.

scripts.test: export TEST=true&& npm run build && mocha --full-trace --require ./dist/test/setup.js ./dist/test/*.test.js ./dist/test/**/*.test.js && export DEBUG=bot:*&& export TEST=false

author: Johnny Bueti
